metadata.title: CVE-2021-47181 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: musb: tusb6010: check return value after callingplatform_get_resource()It will cause null-ptr-deref if platform_get_resource() returns NULL,we need check the return value.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
